about_the_game:
Nato armies are engaged in a 21th century conflict against Russian Federation Army.

As a Top Gun Pilot from US Air Force, you fly the best American Fighters (F18, F35, F22...) throught multiple missions across battlefields around the world (Cuba, Lebanon, Ukraine...) in cooperation with your European Allies Aircrafts (Typhoon, Rafale, Mirage...).

You will be engaged in air combat againsts Russian Fighters (Mig 27, Mig 33, Su 37...).

Lock your targets, choose amongst different missile systems and riffle, shoot and forget!

Powered by an very realistic physic engine that makes the game highly playable, Air Gun Fighter will make you feel real sensations of modern air combat.
detailed_description:
Nato armies are engaged in a 21th century conflict against Russian Federation Army.

As a Top Gun Pilot from US Air Force, you fly the best American Fighters (F18, F35, F22...) throught multiple missions across battlefields around the world (Cuba, Lebanon, Ukraine...) in cooperation with your European Allies Aircrafts (Typhoon, Rafale, Mirage...).

You will be engaged in air combat againsts Russian Fighters (Mig 27, Mig 33, Su 37...).

Lock your targets, choose amongst different missile systems and riffle, shoot and forget!

Powered by an very realistic physic engine that makes the game highly playable, Air Gun Fighter will make you feel real sensations of modern air combat.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 1.3GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

name: Air Gun Fighter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octo-Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
